content: Multipurpose reciprocating saw blades (carbide) Ultimate carbide reciprocating saw blades for demolition and fast cutting through metal, wood and other materials ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Top-performance carbide reciprocating saw blades delivering the cutting power and longevity needed on your toughest demolition jobs Unbeatable cutting life – one Hilti carbide recip blade will outlast up to 50 Standard bimetal blades Ultimate efficiency and economy – this longer-lasting blade can more than pay for itself in durability and fewer work stoppages for blade replacements Heavy-duty quality – special tooth geometry and fewer teeth-per-inch help these blades to cut tougher materials with ease Applications Faster cuts to save time on extra-heavy-duty demolition work Cutting cast iron and high alloyed steel pipes and parts Cutting heavy metal-embedded wood Demolishing drywall Cutting through epoxy ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Ultimate Shank: 1/2 in universal shank Teeth per inch: 6 Technical Data | Product Class | Ultimate | Teeth per inch | 6 | Blade features | Long life, Fast cut, Straight cut, Carbide tipped ### ITEMS- 2337439 - Recip saw blade SPX 6 6 TPI (3) - Package Size 3 pc - 2337441 - Recip saw blade SPX 9 6 TPI (3) - Package Size 3 pc - 2337443 - Recip saw blade SPX 12 6 TPI (3) - Package Size 3 pc
